section_1.title:
Together in the 
 digital 
 transformation
section_1.description: We help you get your ideas off the ground. At merliteam, we transform your vision into quality digital solutions. With passion, technology and solid connections, we drive your projects towards success. Find out how we can get your ideas off the ground today.

section_2.title: Our process in action
section_2.description: From idea to takeoff, discover how we transform your visions into tangible successes, step by step. Each phase of our process is carefully designed to ensure your project moves forward smoothly and reaches new heights.

section_3.title:
We want to help you 
 get your ideas 
 off the ground
section_3.description: Our team is ready to listen to your projects and answer your questions. Contact us and let's start this exciting journey together.

video.title: At MerliTeam:
video.01: We help you launch your ideas.
video.02: We transform your vision into high-quality digital solutions.
video.03: With passion, technology, and strong connections, we drive your projects toward success.
video.04: Discover how we can help your ideas take off today.

01.title: Software Development
01.description:
We have a team of experts in the latest technologies whom we fully trust to accompany you from Discovery to implementation.

 **Custom Projects:**
- Web and Mobile Development
- Service Integrations
- Rest Service Development

02.title: Online Stores
02.description: **We are a Shopify partner**, we create your online store or integrate one into your website.

03.title: Data Analysis
03.description:
We connect with various data sources and help you understand your information.

- Power BI
- Tableau
- Consult for data exploitation in your preferred software: Grafana, Zabbix, Prometheus
- Custom dashboard and reporting developments

04.title: Consulting
04.description: We help companies adopt agile methodologies and train your team to align quickly. We also offer mentoring and coaching to organize your business, achieving a proven and productive framework.

05.title: UX / UI
05.description: A team of highly qualified experts will help you improve the user experience when using your products.

06.title: Marketing and SEO
06.description: We work together with marketing agencies we trust the most, who help us launch our clients' campaigns successfully.

actionProcess.title: Our process in action
actionProcess.description: From idea to takeoff, discover how we transform your visions into tangible successes, step by step. Each phase of our process is carefully designed to ensure your project moves forward smoothly and reaches new heights.

01.title: 1. Discovery
01.description:
In this initial phase, we will work closely
to understand your needs and objectives.

02.title: 2. Research
02.description: We will analyze the market, competition, and relevant trends for your product.

03.title: 3. Design
03.description: We will create designs that reflect your ideas and provide an exceptional user experience.

04.title: 4. Development
04.description: Developers will work ensuring that everything runs smoothly and is ready for implementation.

05.title: 5. Testing
05.description: Before launching the product to the public, we will carry out a rigorous testing process.

06.title: 6. Implementation
06.description: Before launching the product to the public, we will carry out a rigorous testing process.

main.title: Driving the Digital Success of Our Clients
main.subtitle: At Merli Team, we take pride in transforming ideas into digital solutions that deliver results. With a personalized approach and a commitment to excellence, we help our clients achieve their goals and stand out in their markets.

01.description: We are helping the company's management team understand where exactly all their assets that they import from different countries are distributed using powerBI technology.

02.description: We are doing different jobs with them, currently we are carrying out custom projects using PowerBI, connecting to their databases and exploiting the information in conjunction with the company directory.

03.description: In this case we are helping with different types of sales reports for their products to help the C level understand their data and be able to adopt different market strategies using powerBI technology.

04.description: We are part of their staff and have implemented the AGILE framework.
